entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Grand Falls-Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:00 AM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Badger 06:30 AM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Temperature: -5.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -7.8°C
Wind: E 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow changing to wet snow near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
